thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Merrill Lynch Ex-CEO Turns to Uber as His Next Fix-It Project

author: Michael Wursthorn
title: Merrill Lynch Ex-CEO Turns to Uber as His Next Fix-It Project
text:
A decade after the financial crisis, The Wall Street Journal has checked in on dozens of the bankers, government officials, chief executives, hedge-fund managers and others who left a mark on that period to find out what they are doing now. Today, we spotlight former CEO of Merrill Lynch, John Thain, and former CEO of Northern Rock, Adam Applegarth.
John Thain still clings to his roots as a corporate fix-it guy.
The...
